message: Bob, I'm offering you my product for $14,000. It's a great deal, and I'm confident you'll find it very valuable. Let me know what you think!
Alice, thank you for your offer. I appreciate the value of your product, but I can only pay up to $12,000 for it. Please let me know if this is something we can work with.

Bob, I understand your position, but $12,000 is simply too low for me. I'm willing to come down to $13,000, as a sign of good faith. This is a fair price considering the value of the product. Let's see if we can reach an agreement.
